pyqt_gui module

class pyqt_gui.SaveSessionWindow(parent=None)[source]

Bases: QDialog

Dialog for saving the current session before exiting the application.

close_without_saving()[source]

Close the application without saving the current session.

This method is called when the user opts to exit the application without saving their current session. It triggers the QApplication to quit, effectively closing the application.

Returns:

None

Return type:

None

enable_save_button(index)[source]

Enable or disable the save button based on the selected format.

This method enables the save button if a valid save format is selected from the dropdown (i.e., the index is not -1). Otherwise, it disables the button.

Parameters:

index (int) -- The index of the selected save format in the dropdown.

Returns:

None

Return type:

None

initUI()[source]

Set up the UI components for the save session dialog.

save_and_close()[source]

Save the current session in the selected format and close the application.

This method retrieves the currently selected save format from the dropdown and calls the method to save the session. After saving, it terminates the application.

Returns:

None

Return type:

None

Raises:

Exception -- Raises an exception if the save format is invalid.

save_session_as(format)[source]

Save the current session data in the specified format.

This method saves the session data (students, instructors, and courses) in the format specified by the user (pickle, CSV, or JSON). It retrieves the current working directory and creates a DataManager instance for handling the data saving operations. If an invalid format is specified, it displays an error message.

Parameters:

format -- The format in which to save the session data.

This can be either 'pickle', 'csv', or 'json'. :type format: str :return: None :rtype: None :raises Exception: Raises an error message if an invalid format is specified.

class pyqt_gui.SchoolManagementSystem[source]

Bases: QMainWindow

A class to manage the school management system interface and functionalities.

This class creates a GUI application for managing students, instructors, and courses. It provides functionalities to register, delete, and view students and instructors, as well as managing courses and their enrollments.

central_widget

The central widget for the main window.

Type:

QWidget

layout

The main layout of the application.

Type:

QVBoxLayout

tab_widget

The tab widget containing different management tabs.

Type:

QTabWidget

message_label

Label to display messages to the user.

Type:

QLabel

timer

Timer to clear messages after a specified duration.

Type:

QTimer

add_course_command()[source]

Add a new course based on user input.

Retrieves the course name and description entered in the Course tab, attempts to register the course, and updates the UI accordingly.

Returns:

None

Return type:

None

Raises:

ValueError -- If the course registration fails, an appropriate message is shown.

clear_message()[source]

Clear the message label after a timeout.

closeEvent(event)[source]

Handle the close event of the main window.

This method prompts the user to save the session before closing.

Parameters:

event (QCloseEvent) -- The close event triggered by the window.

delete_instructor_command()[source]

Retrieves the instructor ID from the input field, attempts to remove the instructor, and updates the UI accordingly.

Returns:

None

Return type:

Raises:

get_course_options()[source]

Retrieve a list of course options for the combo boxes.

This method fetches all registered courses and formats their names and IDs for display in combo boxes.

Returns:

List of formatted strings representing courses.

Return type:

list
